text:
BC! Sabne sab kuchh to likh diya. Me kya likhu?

Branch se hi contact me aaya tha even after being a wingie. I wish jaldi aaya hota. Bc kitni galtiya na karta zindagi me me. Aur yaar! Samaj hi nahi aa raha kya likhu. Apne saath me jitni memories hai woh koi aisi bakchodi wali nahi hai. Sukoon wali hai bhai. Saath me terrace pe jana, saath me campus ghumna, saath me shopping karna, saath me resturant jana. BC aisa lag raha hai dating ke baare me likh raha kisi bandi se ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚

Anyways! Mere saare mood swings sambhalne ke liye thank you bhai. Tu nahi hota to chize karne me confidence nahi aata. You are & will always be that "Validation wala Filter" for every major thing that I will do. Tuje niche jaate bhi dekha hai, chaapte hue bhi dekha hai, naachte, gaate, acting karte bhi dekha hai.

Koi chaapu nahi hai tu. Woh to meri kripadrashti ka kamaal hai. I can't even imagine ki yeh banda abhi bhi bas 20 saal ka hai. I have seen your desperation for acads, girls & even me coming to Bangalore. Tere to maze hai. ğŸ˜‚ğŸ¤¦ğŸ»â€â™‚ï¸

Goa trip tere bina imagine bhi nahi kar sakta bhai. Tere darr, tere chochle, teri balchodiya - sab mast hai bhai. Externally koi banda dekhega to apan ko c*** kahega but we all know ki Modi Varshney ki yaari bhai alag level pe hai. Jay to aise hi bolta rehta hai ki bulla karta tha woh and all. Uski vastavikta hi chhoti hai to ab kya kare. 

Mere saare mood swings jaante hi ho tum, sambhale bhi hai kaafi tune, aage bhi sambhalte rehna. Me tereko positive approach deta rahega. Bhai! Startup saath me to nahi par ek time pe shuru kara hai to saath me aage bachenge, grow karenge, parties & trips marenge aur bohot memories banayenge.

Bhai! Iski word limit kya hoti hai? Chhod. Ab khatam karta. Baaki to tuje sab pata hi hai XD

MERE UPAR ITNA CONFIDENCE RAKHNE KE LIYE AUR SAPPOT KARNE KE LIYE THANKS (DUTY HAI TERI BC) Bangalore wala challenge pakka karke dikhayega. 

â¤ï¸ğŸ¥°ğŸ‰ğŸ¥³

Tu kaafi Ajeeb tha shuruat me. Lol. But time ke saath sab bade ho jaate hai. Tu bhi ho gaya. Baap banne ka bohot shaukh tha bachpan se hi tuje ğŸ˜› to wing me hi bachche bana liye the na hehe.

Thanks bhai alag alag conditions me helpful rehne ke liye. Video calls pe daaru ki bottles dikhane ke liye (as if me pita hu XD) & cricket ki bakchodiya batane ke liye. Kya maze the na match dekhne ke ğŸ¥ºâ¤ï¸

Chaapu to ho hi tum. If it's intern, Antaragni or Entrepreneurship. Yeh spirit kabhi mat chhodna.

text:
Yo Raghuwanshi! Kaisa hai?
Ekdam big guy jaisi personality ke saath aaya hua yeh banda itna humble, friendly & cool hoga yeh maine shuruat me nahi socha tha. Majorly apan Ameya ki wajah se hi connect hue the aur woh bc pata nahi kidhar bhaag gaya ğŸ™„
Chill hai. To bhai! Even after doing so many weird things, thanks for trusting me & thanks for believing in me. I know mere left right ka problem hai but tu hamesha samajne ki koshish karta tha. Me hota to bhaga deta aise bande ko ğŸ˜›
Sincere to tu hai hi. Gaadi chalana hai to no drinking ğŸ¥² 
Bhai! ESO202 se hi connect hue the apan majorly. Kya bhai tu nahi hota to mere Mech courses me D lagna 2nd year se hi shuru ho jata. ğŸ¥º ECO201 me bhi alag hi maze aaye the library me bethte padhne me. Itna confidence aa gaya tha ki tere saath agar koi course aa gaya to me bhi bakchod grade le hi aaunga.
Thank you for believing & appreciating me whenever I needed. Daal-tadka is better than Chicken tikka bro ğŸ¥ºğŸ¥º
Bhale tu North me hi reh raha hai but I will assure you ki aur trips marenge saath me aur memrijjjj banayenge bohot saari.
Thank me later for all the cool photographs ğŸ˜â¤ï¸

From buying cooler together to having infinite glasses of Nimbu paani, I know we will meet soon somewhere in this small world.

text:
The only guy of C-Mid jisko bologe ki utha den subeh & pakka se utha hi dega. Ussi pal samaj gaye the ki koi ho na ho, yeh banda bc nange paau bhi apni help ke liye aa jayega.
You know mere mood swings or nature ki wajah se I wasn't in contact with many people from our wing. And I still regret ki yaar tumse shuruat se baat karna chahiye tha. Kya mast aadmi hai tu. Na duniya ki fikar, na koi darr (Bahubali suits you perfectly). Samaj to nahi aa raha ki kya kya likhu. Lag raha hai sab bhul gaya hu ğŸ˜­
But Campus ki major trip saath me kari uss baat ka proud hai muje. Tour planning wala zarurr kabhi karenge. (Bank wala kaam dekh lena tu ğŸ˜›) Kaafi log tuje bolte hai ki overconfidence me mat reh par I would say ki tera jo khud pe ya haalato se confidence hai wahi zalakta hai hamesha. Stay the same. 
Aur bc kapde kharidna bandh kar. Ladki ko aisa na lage ki yeh to mere wale kaam kar raha XD
Apna bro code hamesha kaayam raha tha & rahega. ğŸ˜ Woh jagah, insaan, haalat badalne se kabhi nahi badlega. Nukkad natak wale time se apan zyada connect hue the. I am still happy ki woh chhod diya tha ğŸ˜› But Bahubali, aur fulo falo - khush raho â¤ï¸

text:
Gandhi & Modi bhi dost ho sakte hai ğŸ˜‚
Most of the people we interact with in college life are the people we meet during our 2nd, 3rd, 4th year but you surely was the first person jisko dekhke iss anjaan city, anjaan logo ke bich relief mila tha. Me aaj jo bhi hu, kar raha hu & kiya college me uska base banta hi nahi agar tu nahi hota to. 
Late trains, missed flights, 2-2 Delhi trips (trip bhi nahi keh sakte unko). I know last last tak aate aate interaction zero sa hi ho gaya tha. Awkward smiles & hi's took over. 
But jab bhi tujhe dekhta hu, respect aati hai tere liye ki itna kuchh ek saath manage kaise kar pata hai. Teri 1st yaar & pre-college life ki BTs aaj bhi yaad hai muje. Tera train me weirdly so jana & thand se delhi me frust ho jana. Apna 50 kilo ki bags leke Galiyo me sehme sehme ghumna ğŸ˜¬
We surely aren't on the same chapter of our books (poetic sound karane ke liye likha bas) but tere saath marines pe bethke baatein karne me mazaa aayega jab Bombay aane ka hoga tab. 
You deserve so much more happiness & smiles. ğŸ˜Œâ¤ï¸
Gandhiji ki jai ho
Much love ğŸ¥³ğŸ¥°

text:
Dekho aisa hai Jay bhai. Khafa to hum hai aapse. But aapko dost bola hai to yeh to likhna hi padega 
IITK me pehli baar jiske saath OAT me hangout kara tha woh tum hi the. Tab se OAT is our fav spot. Thik hai. I know ab tu Rnd Rona karega. Par I wished all my first year ki 19-20 ka faasla mit jaaye. But you never initiated anything man. 
Dekh. Tu chaapu to hai. (Me gyaan nahi dega isliye tuje). Bas uth jaya kar time pe taaki chaapuness dikhane ka time zyada mil jaaye. Bhai! Ab tuje Dosa khane Sunday kaun uthayega. Teri bindni ko bol dena bhai. Varna me call kar dega aise to. Tera mere saamne apni poems sunanan, Batti freshers ki speech sunana vagerah sab documented hai ğŸ˜› videos & photos me.
Thik hai, tu merese pehle bhand ho liya zindagi me. To kya ho gaya. Tu bhi janta hai ki bakchod to me hi hu. ğŸ˜‚
Me kuchh kharab nahi likhega kyunki you promised to be my first investor (in writing) to relation me daraar nahi la sake. All through first 2 years, we were considered like best brozz. Fir tuje naye dost mil gaye ğŸ¥²ğŸ¥²
Tuje bhi pata hai ki I was so insecure of losing a friend like you in my 3rd year but maine bhi galtiya kari thi. Ladte to rahenge hi apan kyunki tune placement wala photo tak hatva diya tha. ğŸ˜­
Tere raat wale bande ko mera namaskaar kehna. Aur yaad rakhna. Teri pehli raani se lekar tera pehla Tinder match, sab witness kara hai maine. ğŸ˜
